meanings.definition: A type of amino acid found in many proteins.
meanings.sent1: Tryptophans are important building blocks for proteins.
meanings.sent2: I need to eat foods rich in tryptophans to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The tryptophans in my meal are having a party in my body!
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking is like a sprinkle of tryptophans in a delicious recipe.
meanings.sent5: The tryptophans in the protein shake gave me energy for the whole day.

meanings.definition: Tryptophans are essential for the production of serotonin in the brain.
meanings.sent1: The tryptophans in my diet help my brain make serotonin.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend foods high in tryptophans for better mood.
meanings.sent3: The tryptophans in my brain are like little workers making happiness.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a burst of tryptophans, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The tryptophans in the brain are like stars lighting up the night sky of emotions.
